title: An Exact relation of an honovrable victory obtained by the Parliaments forces in Yorkshire as it was sent in a letter, and read in both houses of Parliament, on Saturday, Maii 27, 1643 / subscribed by Sir Tho. Fairefax ... [et. al] ; wherein is related their manner of the taking of Wakefield ...
author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
